MtkGCTPCreateLatLon.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*===========================================================================
00002 =                                                                           =
00003 =                          MtkGCTPCreateLatLon                              =
00004 =                                                                           =
00005 =============================================================================
00006 
00007                          Jet Propulsion Laboratory
00008                                    MISR
00009                                MISR Toolkit
00010 
00011             Copyright 2008, California Institute of Technology.
00012                            ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
00013                  U.S. Government Sponsorship acknowledged.
00014 
00015 ============================================================================*/
00016 
00017 #include "MisrMapQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00019 #include "MisrCoordQuery.h" /* definitino of inv_init  */
00020 #include <stdlib.h>
00021 #include <math.h>
00022 
00036 MTKt_status MtkGCTPCreateLatLon(
00037   const MTKt_GenericMapInfo *Map_info,  
00038   const MTKt_GCTPProjInfo *Proj_info, 
00039   MTKt_DataBuffer *Latitude,  
00040   MTKt_DataBuffer *Longitude 
00041 )
00042 {
00043   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00044   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00045   MTKt_DataBuffer latitude_tmp = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00046                 /* Latitude values in degrees */
00047   MTKt_DataBuffer longitude_tmp = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00048                 /* Longitude values in degrees */
00049   int iflg;         /* Status flag returned by GCTP library. */
00050   int (*inv_trans[1000])();     /* Array of transform functions returned by GCTP. */
00051   int iline;            /* Loop iterator. */
00052   int isample;          /* Loop iterator. */
00053   double rad2deg = 180.0 / acos(-1);
00054 
00055   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00056   /* Argument check: Map_info == NULL                                   */
00057   /*                 Map_info->size_x < 1                               */
00058   /*                 Map_info->size_y < 1                               */
00059   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00060 
00061   if (Map_info == NULL) {
00062     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR,"Map_info == NULL");
00063   }
00064   if (Map_info->size_line < 1) {
00065     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR,"Map_info->size_line < 1");
00066   }
00067   if (Map_info->size_sample < 1) {
00068     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR,"Map_info->size_sample < 1");
00069   }
00070 
00071   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00072   /* Argument check: Proj_info == NULL                                  */
00073   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00074 
00075   if (Proj_info == NULL) {
00076     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR,"Proj_info == NULL");
00077   }
00078 
00079   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00080   /* Argument check: Latitude == NULL                                   */
00081   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00082 
00083   if (Latitude == NULL) {
00084     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR,"Latitude == NULL");
00085   }
00086 
00087   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00088   /* Argument check: Longitude == NULL                                  */
00089   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00090 
00091   if (Longitude == NULL) {
00092     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR,"Longitude == NULL");
00093   }
00094 
00095   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00096   /* Allocate memory for latitude and longitude.                        */
00097   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00098 
00099   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(Map_info->size_line, Map_info->size_sample, 
00100                  MTKe_double, &latitude_tmp);
00101   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00102 
00103   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(Map_info->size_line, Map_info->size_sample, 
00104                  MTKe_double, &longitude_tmp);
00105   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00106 
00107   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00108   /* Initialize GCTP library.                                           */
00109   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00110 
00111   inv_init(Proj_info->proj_code, Proj_info->zone_code, Proj_info->proj_param,
00112        Proj_info->sphere_code, 0, 0, &iflg, inv_trans);
00113   if (iflg) {
00114     printf("iflg = %d\n",iflg);
00115     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_GCTP_INVERSE_INIT_FAILED);
00116   }
00117 
00118   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00119   /* For each pixel...                                                  */
00120   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00121 
00122   for (iline = 0 ; iline < Map_info->size_line ; iline++) {
00123     for (isample = 0 ; isample < Map_info->size_sample ; isample++) {
00124       double x,y;       /* Map coordinates */
00125       double lat,lon;       /* Lat/lon coordinates */
00126       double line, sample;  /* Pixel coordinates. */
00127 
00128   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00129   /* Calculate map coordinate for this pixel.                           */
00130   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00131 
00132       line = (((iline - Map_info->tline[2]) * Map_info->tline[3]) - 
00133        Map_info->tline[1]) / Map_info->tline[0];
00134       sample = (((isample - Map_info->tsample[2]) * Map_info->tsample[3]) - 
00135        Map_info->tsample[1]) / Map_info->tsample[0];
00136 
00137   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00138   /* Calculate lat/lon values at this map coordinate.                   */
00139   /* Mapping from X, Y to line, sample depends on the origin code as    */
00140   /* follows:                                                           */
00141   /*                                                                    */
00142   /*   origin_code   line   sample                                      */
00143   /*   UL              Y      X                                         */
00144   /*   UR              X      Y                                         */
00145   /*   LL              X      Y                                         */
00146   /*   LR              Y      X                                         */
00147   /*                                                                    */
00148   /* Argument check: Origin_code not recognized                         */
00149   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00150 
00151       switch(Map_info->origin_code) {
00152       case MTKe_ORIGIN_UL:
00153       case MTKe_ORIGIN_LR:
00154     x = sample;
00155     y = line; 
00156     break;
00157       case MTKe_ORIGIN_UR:
00158       case MTKe_ORIGIN_LL:
00159     x = line;
00160     y = sample; 
00161     break;
00162       default:
00163     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS,"Origin_code not recognized");
00164       }
00165       
00166       inv_trans[Proj_info->proj_code](x, y, &lon, &lat);
00167        
00168   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00169   /* Set lat/lon for this pixel.                                        */
00170   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00171 
00172        latitude_tmp.data.d[iline][isample] = lat * rad2deg;
00173        longitude_tmp.data.d[iline][isample] = lon * rad2deg;
00174 
00175   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00176   /* End loop for each pixel.                                           */
00177   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00178 
00179     }
00180   }
00181   
00182   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00183   /* Return.                                                            */
00184   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00185 
00186   *Latitude = latitude_tmp;
00187   *Longitude = longitude_tmp;
00188   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00189 
00190 ERROR_HANDLE:
00191   MtkDataBufferFree(&latitude_tmp);
00192   MtkDataBufferFree(&longitude_tmp);
00193   return status_code;
00194 }
